titleStmt.title: A just and modest vindication of the proceedings of the two last parliaments
titleStmt.author: Jones, William, Sir, 1631-1682.
Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: Written by Sir William Jones. Cf. DNB.
Also attributed to Robert Ferguson. Cf. Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
